sentences.english: The sludge concentration has a significant impact on membrane filtration resistance.
sentences.chinese: 污泥浓度对膜过滤阻力上升速率影响显著。

sentences.english: General considerations, one-time application of dry sludge per 667m2 should be less than 8 tons.
sentences.chinese: 总体考虑，一次性每亩施用干污泥应控制在8吨以下。

sentences.english: Beside it, half buried in dirt, was a discarded banner.
sentences.chinese: 在它旁边，一条丢弃的横幅半埋于污泥中。

sentences.english: The trousers were bespattered  with mud.
sentences.chinese: 裤子被溅起的污泥弄脏了。

sentences.english: Pedestrians were splashed to the HIP in muddy slush.
sentences.chinese: 行人走在泥浆中，下半身全溅上了污泥。

sentences.english: The tested sewage sludge is acid.
Supply and install clarifier sludge outlet sluice valves.
sentences.chinese: 供应及安装净化污泥出路水闸阀门。

sentences.english: During the experiment, there were significant changes in each cell. Inoculated sludge was black.
sentences.chinese: 试验过程中，各隔室污泥性状发生了明显的改变。

sentences.english: Industry belched out smoke and sludge with little fear of legal consequences or bad press.
sentences.chinese: 工业湾烟和污泥没有恐惧的法律后果或负面新闻。

sentences.english: It verifies that the application of chemical sludge fillers in biofilter is feasible.
sentences.chinese: 验证了化工污泥基填料应用于生物滤池的可行性。

sentences.english: Mark churned wildly through the muck trying to keep up.
sentences.chinese: 马克在污泥中拚命摇晃着努力保持平衡。

sentences.english: The paper systematically analyzed the oily sludge generated from petroleum refining in the Liaohe oilfield.
sentences.chinese: 分析了辽河油田石油炼制过程中产生的含油污泥。

sentences.english: Mainly used for sludge dewatering, solid-liquid separation and coal washing, etc.
sentences.chinese: 主要用于污泥脱水，固液分离和洗煤等。

sentences.english: This paper summarized the resent knowledge on heavy metal and pathogenic organisms in sludge.
sentences.chinese: 文章概述了有关污泥中重金属及病源体的研究状况。

sentences.english: The utilization of brewery sludge not only helps clean the environment, but also lowers the cost of alga cultivation.
sentences.chinese: 利用啤酒厂污泥既净化环境，又降低藻类养殖成本。

sentences.english: Granulation is the core technology in high-speed anaerobic reactors .
sentences.chinese: 污泥颗粒化是高效厌氧反应器的核心技术。
